attributes.action: Make it compulsory that all road works on arterial roads be carried out 24/7
attributes.additional_details: As road users  we are use to delays and traffic jams due to the volume of today’s road users. One major problem is ongoing road works , this can seriously be eradicated if works on arterial roads we undertaken 24 hours a day , 7 days a week
attributes.background: I would like to see all road works carried out on arterial roads be carried out on a 24 hour day , 7 day a week to stop continuous traffic jams , additional pollution and loss of time to the road user

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about how to manage roadworks are an operational matter for the relevant traffic authority, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
